TopicTitle: Review/Spotlight of the B9 Aerospace Mod (Cockpits and IVA)

Articles.Content: Check out the Spotlight I did of the B9 Aerospace Mod (Cockpits and IVA) on YouTube: http://youtu.be/9Ht85d-OI-I

I'd just like to point out that the IVA you're spotlighting inside the Mk1 Command Pod is with regards to RasterPropMonitor, it's not a direct part of B9.

Also, "Mk" is pronounced "mark". It's a synonym of "version", so the "Mk 1 Command Pod" is essentially "Command Pod version 1"

Edited November 26, 2014 by King Arthur

The B9 download includes the JSI directory which does in fact contain the RasterPropMonitor. Unless I am missing something perhaps?

And thanks for pointing out about the Mk pronunciation X(

I'll be sure to pronounce it properly in the future.

I'm aware that B9 bundles RPM, but the spotlight is misleading as it appears to promote RPM's own stuff (like the Mk1 Command Pod IVA) as B9 components. RPM's stock IVA replacements/upgrades like the Mk1's can be had just from installing RPM alone, so it's not directly related to B9.

Ah, I see what your saying, and I agree the way I present it is misleading. My intention was to spotlight the B9 pack as a whole, and so I presented it as a whole as the B9 Aerospace pack. I'll add information about the bundled mods and their authors in the video description then.
I changed the description to give credit for individual mod authors and the mods which are provided in the B9 pack.
